text: Eric Thompson (born December 4, 1980) is a Canadian professional wrestler currently working for the National Wrestling Alliance (NWA), under the ring name Zyon. He is best known for his time in WWE under the ring names Rick Victor and Viktor. He was a part of the tag team The Ascension with Konnor. He is a former one-time NXT Tag Team Champion with Konnor. They were the longest reigning NXT Tag Team Champions of all time, holding the titles for 364 days. ==Championships and accomplishments== *Atomic Revolutionary Wrestling **ARW Tag Team Championship (1 time) – with Big Kon *Florida Championship Wrestling **FCW Florida Heavyweight Championship (2 times) **FCW Florida Tag Team Championship (1 time) – with Brad Maddox *Ohio Valley Wrestling **OVW Heavyweight Championship (2 times) **OVW Southern Tag Team Championship (1 time) – with Vaughn Lilas *Prairie Wrestling Alliance **PWA Mayhem Championship (1 time) *Pro Wrestling Illustrated **PWI ranked him No. 128 of the top 500 singles wrestlers in the PWI 500 in 2014 *Stampede Wrestling **Stampede North American Heavyweight Championship (2 time) **Stampede Wrestling International Tag Team Championship (2 times) – with Dave Swift (1) and Harry Smith (1) *WWE ** NXT Tag Team Championship (1 time) – with Konnor ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1980 births Category:Canadian professional wrestlers Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Alberta Category:Former WWE wrestlers
title: Rick Victor
